data.actual_result: RTC panel stays open and can lock up Discord if user section is clicked
data.expected_result: RTC debug panel should automatically close when disconnected from voice channel
data.short_description: RTC panel also does not disappear on user removal from server containg current voice channel /deletion of voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to a voice channel - Open RTC debug menu - Get removed from the server the voice channel is part of
